captions.text: Why we're here? For the Red Bull Soap box race!
Yes, first on a ramp downhill
then left on the Mont des arts and then right turn
again a small turn, a jump...
Then the chicane. Stay alert so you don't lose control, and finally the 90 degree turn. Its fantastic!

title: Downhill soapbox race - Red Bull Soapbox Belgium 2012
